actions.title: Arlington PDF Model
actions.name: arlington_pdf_model
actions.desc: An action that automatically checks grammar in PDF using the Arlington PDF Model. The verification output is a report containing all of the grammatical errors contained in your PDF.

configurations.title: HTML Validation Report
configurations.name: html_validation_report
configurations.desc: Generate a PDF validation report in HTML format
configurations.program: docker run --platform linux/amd64 -v "${working_directory}:/data" --rm pdfix/arlington-pdf-model:latest validate --format html --input "/data/${input_pdf}" --output "/data/${output_html}"

args.name: max_failures
args.desc: Limit of checked fails. If fails reached limit, validation stops.

args.name: max_failures_displayed
args.desc: Maximum fails to displayed. If -1, displayed all.

args.name: input_pdf
args.desc: Path to PDF document you want to proccess
